verbs.description: iconic phoenix melrose district liquor store [V: could] soon be demolished it has been a part of phoenix melrose district for years and now people living in the area are fighting to keep a pink liquor store from getting ripped down and replaced by apartments fox 10 phoenix melrose district melrose district melrose liquors dj buhrle
